By darklao on Tuesday, August 15, 2006 - 10:41 pm:

This would be great.

A couple things I've noticed: The adventure monsters change from week to week or adventure to adventure, for instance, sometimes you'll get a lot of a certain sub-type, so like on one trip to Warp it'll be a lot of joker subs, on another it'll be a lot of dragon subs, or zan subs.

About the saucer shops, I've noticed the selection changes somewhat from week to week, but I also think that area fame is a factor, especially for opening the /?s in the shop. I could be wrong, though.

Good luck!

Big Tokobot (Golem/???)
Found: Grabad, 3Yr, 7Mo, 3 Wk.

PieRipper (Ripper/???) (Note: Pie stands for Pirate)
Found: Grabad, 3Yr, 9Mo, 3Wk.

Yes, I'm still not very far in the game. I can't get the free time. Even now, I can't get focussed enough for DDMR. It's not the working person's game, espeically when they work night shift ^_^; In any case, a little clue I HAVE found, or THINK I've found at least, is that certain disks are annual. Once they've appeared, they should be there the same time next year.

By Eagle Fierce on Thursday, August 17, 2006 - 01:24 pm:

I don't like double-posting, but as for Area Fame, I don't think it's an issue. When I got these Disks, I was still pretty fresh in the game, and definitely no more than a 30 Fame, if that (probably closer to 20 or even 15). I'd put on about 8 shows in the starting town, and then no more than 2 in Grabad. Good luck in finding out if there IS a trigger for /??? Discs, though.

By mwmj on Saturday, August 19, 2006 - 12:15 am:

Okay First round of info.
Colno Disk shop
This list may still be Incomplete but it seems that it repeats after awhile.
Gelotine: Mocchi/Jell 1,2,1,2,2,2
Green Suezo: Suezo/Plant 1,2,1,2,1,2
GigaBio: Golem/Gitan 2,2,1,1,2,2
Eared Mew: Mew/Hare 2,2,2,2,1,1
Eared mew was replaced with
PumpkiDuck: Ducken/Pancho 1,2,2,1,2,1
on the second week then Eared Mew Reappeared the week After.
PinkGolem: Golem/Pixie 2,2,1,1,2,2
Appeared after the first meeting with the mayor. Major Events don't seem to affect the time the disks change. PinkGolem Replaced the Eared Mew who returned after the second meeting with the mayor.
HawkClaw: Piroro/Raiden 1,2,2,2,2,1
Replaced Eared Mew after the Violet Cats meeting.
Janne: Pixie/Durahan 1,2,2,2,1,1
Replaced HawkClaw The week after Hawkclaw appeared. (First Week of March).

To Sum up just the list itself its
Gelotine: Mocchi/Jell 1,2,1,2,2,2
Green Suezo: Suezo/Plant 1,2,1,2,1,2
GigaBio: Golem/Gitan 2,2,1,1,2,2
Eared Mew: Mew/Hare 2,2,2,2,1,1
PumpkiDuck: Ducken/Pancho 1,2,2,1,2,1
HawkClaw: Piroro/Raiden 1,2,2,2,2,1
Janne: Pixie/Durahan 1,2,2,2,1,1

Let me know if you have any questions Sorry if this list is a little confusing just wanted everyone to know when the changes occured. Also incase your wondering i checked Every week when i was able to.
